argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) -> W e. Word V ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_anim1i | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( W e. Word V /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) <-> ( W e. Word V /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( W e. Word V /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ccatw2s1ccatws2 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( W ++ <" X "> ) ++ <" Y "> ) = ( W ++ <" X Y "> ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( ( ( W ++ <" X "> ) ++ <" Y "> ) ` I ) = ( ( W ++ <" X Y "> ) ` I ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( W ++ <" X "> ) ++ <" Y "> ) ` I ) = ( ( W ++ <" X Y "> ) ` I ) ) |
| 8 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> W e. Word V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_s2cl | |- ( ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> <" X Y "> e. Word V ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> <" X Y "> e. Word V ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) -> I e. NN0 ) |
| 12 |  | #P_lencl | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. NN0 ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_nn0zd | |- ( W e. Word V -> ( # ` W ) e. ZZ ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) -> ( # ` W ) e. ZZ ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) -> I < ( # ` W ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_elfzo0z | |- ( I e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) <-> ( I e. NN0 /\ ( # ` W ) e. ZZ /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 14, 15, 16 | #P_syl3anbrc | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) -> I e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> I e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ccatval1 | |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ <" X Y "> e. Word V /\ I e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( W ++ <" X Y "> ) ` I ) = ( W ` I ) ) |
| 20 | 8, 10, 18, 19 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( W ++ <" X Y "> ) ` I ) = ( W ` I ) ) |
| 21 | 7, 20 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( ( W e. Word V /\ I e. NN0 /\ I < ( # ` W ) ) /\ ( X e. V /\ Y e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( W ++ <" X "> ) ++ <" Y "> ) ` I ) = ( W ` I ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ ccat2s1fvw using words of length 2, see ~ df-s2 .  A symbol of the concatenation of a word with two single symbols corresponding to the symbol of the word.  (Contributed by AV, 22-Sep-2018.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro/AV, 21-Oct-2018.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
